ComicInfo.Title: Phineas' Big Show; The Treasure of the Frigo Helado; Fraud and Fulfillment; Red Hot Squat
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 21:35:42. [CVDB271016] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 20:48:11. [Issue ID 264698]

ComicInfo.Summary:
Fat Freddy exhorts his sleeping cat to seize the day.
Phineas decides he can do better artwork than what he sees in the local gallery, so he creates black velvet paintings and gets them exhibited.
Fat Freddy decides to take up jogging.
Phineas builds an exercise bike that connects to the TV.
Fat Freddy wrecks the refrigerator after consuming all the Amanita muscaria mushrooms Phineas had stored in it.
Fat Freddy can't get to the stinky cat box because he hasn't cleaned it for so long.
An old lady comes across Phineas and Fat Freddy doing graffiti.
The brothers are pranked by some kids after Fat Freddy tells them what they do when police raid their apartment.
Phineas can't remember how he got beat up after he taped some police officers with his video camera.
Phineas is growing magic mushrooms in sterilized mason jars and Fat Freddy can't resist opening them to see if they have sprouted.
Norbert bribes congressmen to get a law passed that cracks down on welfare cheats.
Fat Freddy is taking as many paper napkins as he can get away with from the MacBurger Quicktime restaurant.
The brothers decide to live as squatters in the abandoned building opposite their apartment.
Fat Freddy gives his opinions on dogs.
